website_summaries.verdict: Create your own personal greetings with this large and affordable set of blank cards.
pros: All cards have blank interiors so you can write your own message
A wide variety of designs and greetings to cover every occasion, from birthdays to graduations to weddings
Pack of 48 for a low price
cons: A few complaints of the card stock being too thin

customer_reviews.title: I only received thank you cards.
customer_reviews.text: These cards said "all occasion greeting cards" even outside the box but every one of the cards was a thank you card. They are lovely thank you notes, but not what I ordered and not as described here.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beaty

customer_reviews.title: One of the most useful products bought this year
customer_reviews.text: Very useful box of simple greeting cards - saves me from multiple trips to the card store. Cards are very appropriate and come with nice envelopes (all white). While they might not fit every occasion, they are quite useful to have available for quick notes of thanks and sympathy, as well as accompaniments for birthday gifts, etc. Will definitely be reordering this collection of cards.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad buy for greeting cards
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviewers, I did not receive exactly what the product listed. Per the listing, it was supposed to include. 2x Wedding Congratulations Cards, 4x Baby Shower Cards, 4x Sympathy Cards, 8x Congratulatory Cards, 6x Blank Cards, 8x Thank You Cards, and 16x Happy Birthday Cards. I received 2x wedding, 4x welcome baby (which I think is different than a baby shower card but that's just me haha), 3x sympathy, 7x congratulations (6 general, 1 specifically for a graduate), 6x blank, 8x thank you, 16 birthday cards. So my set was missing two cards. Overall this was still a decent value for having cards ready to go when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moody

customer_reviews.title: These cards are so cute and save me money, too!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pack of these types of cards. My first pack was 100 percent birthday cards. I decided to also give these "all occasion cards" a try. My feelings are the same, so I'm copying my review from the other pack: These are wonderful! I love the size of these cards; not too big and not too small! :) Also, the designs are nice, too. There are plenty to choose from and varying colors of similar designs; perfect for my taste! :) These were just a big hit with me all the way around! I have such a large family that this pack is saving me a LOT of money! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this wasn't bad. I have already saved money by not having to buy overpriced cards from the grocery store, but they are plain. Coupled with glitter washi tape and my calligraphy pen was a start, but they are still just a bit plain. I'm going to use these as base cards and embellish them with my silhouette cameo.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Solid Buy!
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT buy! Seriously I've saved so much money from purchasing these cards and not buying a $5 card every time there has been an occasion. The other by product I didn't expect is that when occasions have popped up I had a card on hand! One star off because quality and variety is just okay. A solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These cards arrived way ahead of schedule and they are awesome! Very sturdy and a nice variety. I needed about 10 of birthday and graduation combined and due to stay-at-home orders, there was no way I was venturing out to buy cards at a store. Now I have a whole box for a variety of happy (and sad) celebrations. Thanks for a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Water damage
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived with water damage. The water damage looked old so I’m assuming this did not happen during shipping. Out of 48 envelopes, only 12 are usable. I’m pretty disappointed that a company would select a damaged item to send to a customer. The cards themselves look sturdy and cute but are pretty much useless without envelopes (which were mostly sealed due to water damage). This would have been a good value otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska5032

customer_reviews.title: Great mix of Greeting Cards
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Mom to have as she enjoys sending cards for any occasion. I was buying cards at the dollar store but when I saw this box, I ordered it immediately. Great value for the money and definitely good quality print on them. The cards are blank inside, at least the ones I saw. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Slightly thin, but good value
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsier than I would like, but still a good value. It's great to have these when I need to send a card to someone but don't want to buy a $4 card for them. :) A good variety of designs.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have, good price and ok quality
customer_reviews.text: These are not the best quality ever, but for the price you pay you can't really go wrong. I got a good mix of cards and the picture is pretty much true to form. They are just simple prints and a look a little on the cheap side, but overall are fine. The selection is good and they are very convenient to have on hand for all occassions
customer_reviews.author: Adam J Prado

customer_reviews.title: Great selection for the price
customer_reviews.text: These cards are so unique. I usually get cards from the dollar store, but these end up being cheaper. It is nice to have a card for every occasion on hand. Good size too. They're not "regular" card size, a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: These are sorta pretty, but to me kinda...bland, I guess; nothing special. You could always look up ‘birthday poems’ on Google for something to put inside. You could also put a company stamp, which these cards are eminently suited for. In other words, I’ll use them, but I wish I’d bought something else. On the other hand, you might love them. They might be just what you’re looking for. So I give them 4 stars, since they are what they’re described as, but they don’t deserve the superlatives and exclamation points.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Z. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value, mostly decent cards
customer_reviews.text: The value here is crazy - 48 cards for 12 dollars? The cards are obviously more on the generic side and there are a few duds in the mix, but for the most part they have nice looking, minimalistic designs. Even if you only use 1/4th of them over time its still a great deal, considering one card is 3-5 dollars in store. These are great cards for people or events you might only be casually close with - if you're looking for truly special occasion cards for someone really close these might not cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: Some of the cards are for birthday, some for wedding, some for sympathy some for congratulations. All great quality and so simple. I bought them for the workplace to have on hand when something happens with the employees. I feel it's important to stay in touch this way.
customer_reviews.author: Cozi

customer_reviews.title: Over priced small index card  size cheap
customer_reviews.text: Really tiny generic cards not full size and 5 designs in just different colors. I did not expect Hallmark however these are bargin rack from a dollar store and way over priced.
customer_reviews.author: edana

customer_reviews.title: Great variety & designs!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why the review asks about the flavor or adhesion for these because they are cards with envelopes. I didn’t notice a “taste” with the envelopes. These are really cute and I love having a variety of different things I can choose from for different occasions .
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsie H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Generic (blank) Cards
customer_reviews.text: I'm keeping them, but they're very generic. Will do if I don't have something else to send. ALL Blank, I got the impression that SOME were blank. But they're well made and while the artwork leaves a little something to be desired, they're sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tami D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: I received all of the cards as stated in the description and they are super cute! I was impressed by how cute and simple the designs are--not too much going on, but just enough for a nice note to send to family and friends. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Assortment as described. Blank inside and on back. Pros - card stock and envelope are sturdy, envelope glue sticks, assorted as described Cons - not as colorful as picture/kind of faded in person, envelopes were too big for box and were bent
customer_reviews.author: Jen46

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment, great price
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Average quality envelopes. Good quality cards. Cute designs. Bought them to have on hand at work for birthdays, work anniversaries, etc. Great price and assortment. I will look for the same brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ylime85

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my best purchase of all time...
customer_reviews.text: Are you that person who’s on their way to a wedding, shower, birthday party, etc and goes ...”CRAP! I forgot a card, AGAIN. Guess I’ll have to send one.” If you purchase this, you’ll never be that person again. And the amount you’ll save in postage from sending all those late cards will pay for this pack. But in all seriousness, this was one of my best purchases ever and it has saved me so many times! I always have a card for any occasion, and it includes some blank ones too so you can personalize for anything! The cards are cute, modern, and truly a great price. I’ll never buy a card from Hallmark again thanks to this bundle!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Seger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Greeting Cards
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice cards. They are a great quality. I thought they might feel cheap, but they didn't. I have already used a few and they were well received. The designs are cute and I appreciate the inside being blank.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy C

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in Cost, Not in Appearance
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a pack of 48 greeting cards for this price, there's an inherent risk there. But these cards deliver! They're not super sturdy, but they're way nicer than I was expecting and there really are cards for every occasion. This is a great set to have as a backup just in case you ever need it. And while they are cheap in cost, they look really legit! For the cost, I can't imagine there being any better option.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Montplaisir

customer_reviews.title: No anniversary cards
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bummed when I received this. I started going through cards and couldn’t find an anniversary card. I assumed it had them and didn’t not look through all the photos. So I was disappointed by this. However it did come with a bunch of card all very nice and great quality. Sympathy card, thinking of you, birthday, wedding, baby, thank you, congrats, graduation, and a few blanks which I may have to make due with for anniversay.
customer_reviews.author: Elixa Haworth

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep around
customer_reviews.text: I am always sending out thank you, hey there, etc cards. It is a nice thing to do for friends and clients. This box is a good deal. It has a variety of cards at a good price. It comes to about 0.27-0.28 cents per card. I used to buy a bunch at the dollar store, but this is a good value as well and the cards are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan Alexandros

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cards
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of cards for the price. I no longer need to go buy cards for every wedding, baby shower and birthday I go to. They don’t feel super cheap or anything and there is a good variety for each event.
customer_reviews.author: Megan 4295

customer_reviews.title: Great selection and variety for the price
customer_reviews.text: These get the job done and I’m happy to have such a wide variety of cards on hand. There’s lots of different designs to choose from for each occasion, so it can please pretty much any crowd. Quality isn’t PERFECT but very happy with what I got for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for convenience, not taste
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I had to review the flavor for this. I would say the edges of the envelope taste as expected. Not too bitter, not too sweet. Good cards, though.
customer_reviews.author: robin677

customer_reviews.title: On hand
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep on hand for when you need a card in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany B

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, the envelopes are glued together so that you can't even get a card inside...cheap, flimsy paper, the designs aren't centered on the front so the borders are uneven and look cheap. Ugh, don't buy
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Quality of cardstock isn't amazing, but also isn't terrible
customer_reviews.text: Tons of cards for the price. Quality of cardstock isn't amazing, but also isn't terrible. The designs are cute, if not a bit bland. You get what you pay for, which is a decent assortment of cards for various occassions.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Greeting cards
customer_reviews.text: Just received these yesterday. They look comparable to the cards I usually purchase. Looking forward to having plenty of cards on hand ready to send.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: A good price. The cards are very basic but nice to have when you need a last minute card to send when you have forgotten an event. You can write your own content which actually makes it more personal. I hate paying outrageous prices for cornball cards. Most adults prefer something personal like this anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Poor Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice small sized greeting cards
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at the card size, they're a little smaller than I th thought th hey would be, but that's on me for not checking
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing super fancy about this collection. However, it is a good price and cards are nice enough. They get the job done!!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect box of cards for those accidental forgotten holidays. I can't say how many times these cards have saved me when I forgot to go to the store. They are made from thick card stock and come with envelopes too. The designs are unisex.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Loves this! Cards are super super cute and great quality. Has so many different occasions. Very good deal to! will rebuy!
customer_reviews.author: Curious Kash

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Nice Array of Cards
customer_reviews.text: Nice array of cards. Have come in handy for all sorts of occasions recently, sympathy, graduations, birthdays, thank yous. I plan to purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Office Admin

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection of cards.
customer_reviews.text: The cards have nice designs, pretty basic and quality is okay. Good to have handy when you need to acknowledge someone/event in a pinch. Price is right for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: JR in OC

customer_reviews.title: Great value and nice assortment  can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable, just add your message. Good card stock. Assortment is clever. Simple, streamlined, handy to have on hand. I like the idea that I can write my own note.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice collection of cards and a great way to buy them. Now I just pick out one wen I need it. No more running to the store for one card.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Schaller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cards. I was under the impression they would contain a greeting on the inside. Nope, they are blank. Just run of the mill, I forgot to get you a card.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great deal! I ordered them because at my office we're always scrambling at the last minute when we remember a birthday or other special occasion. I've already come to the rescue twice in the last couple months, and the cards themselves are adorable and don't look cheap at all. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Not a proper greeting card
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the paper quality. I guess I got what I paid for but was hoping they would be a little better paper and front designs.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, Modern Cards
customer_reviews.text: The interior of the cards is blank, which is perfect for adding your own little personal note. I love the nice, modern design of all of the cards. Very clean and simple. Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor L. Reis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cards for any occasion!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of these cards--- they are all cute in their own way. The quality is good and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Anjelica

customer_reviews.title: Good Value but All Blank Inside
customer_reviews.text: Nice cards but please be aware (I missed this) that all cards are blank inside. Still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Annie8

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price you pay
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred little bit more creativity with this pack. It wasn't the best I've had but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Consuela Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Cute cards
customer_reviews.text: These cards are really great. The print quality is good and the variety is great too. I really think this is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca V

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: At $13 for 48 cards with good variety it’sa bargains. Some cards are similar to Papyrus which sell for $8-12 per card.
customer_reviews.author: Sam kohan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: They aren't amazing, but they do the trick. It works well considering cards are so dang expensive these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda williams

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice cards and variety for the price. You know you’re not getting Hallmark but they are nice enough and convenient to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Small size than expected..
customer_reviews.text: The product is reasonably priced. But the size of the cards is smaller than it looks and the paper is not thick enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Greetings
customer_reviews.text: I send copious cards including my church group, friends, family, seniors home.....this box wz a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Mabel Posh

customer_reviews.title: Nice card stock, for all occasions
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of cards, for all occasions, nice card stock, not cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal parents

customer_reviews.title: nice selection
customer_reviews.text: A nice selection of cards. Write your own messages. Worth the money.. card stores WAY over priced for cards that most people just throw away. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Sunbum122

customer_reviews.title: Great value - good quality for a big selection
customer_reviews.text: good quality great price very basic (in a good way) to be gender or age neutral. you really can’t beat this price.
customer_reviews.author: hawaii_mom

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and helpful
customer_reviews.text: These have come in so handy for graduations, birthdays, and thank yous. It makes it mean more when you have to write your own message versus using a pre made one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I buy these sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: Cute cards, many occasions and will save a ton in cards over the years
customer_reviews.author: Jame

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, great cards! No more scrambling to buy a card at the last minute. There are a few I know I'll never use, but at this price, it doesn't matter
customer_reviews.author: cherryiice

customer_reviews.title: Great value for all occasion cards.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have if you need a special card for most types of events.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Every Single Enveloped Arrived Sealed
customer_reviews.text: Every single envelope is sealed! So annoying to receive these cards but can’t use any envelopes!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses - helped a lot with distance teaching on the computer for hours
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Hazard

customer_reviews.title: Blank cards let you say what's on your mind and in your heart
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the cards are blank so I can truly personalize my message.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne M. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute cards. Not the highest quality but perfect for the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Serrano6

customer_reviews.title: I do not like going to the store just to buy a card
customer_reviews.text: I do not like going to the store just to buy a card. These are nice to have around when you remember a birthday or something at the last minute. The quality is not the best, but they are cute and good to have at home.
customer_reviews.author: MeerKat

customer_reviews.title: SO convenient & CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! So affordable and these come in handy ALL the time!!!! We typically were always stopping at Walgreens on our way to parties/functions and spent $5 + dollars on a stupid card. But NOW I'm always prepared with these adorable, all occasion cards!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Cards smell like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed because these cards smell strongly like factory chemicals, and after a year, they still are off-gassing.
customer_reviews.author: serendipitousreader

customer_reviews.title: Not a good selection of greeting csrds
customer_reviews.text: Not a good variety of good cards. Children could be more creative. I'm giving them away.
customer_reviews.author: Migs

customer_reviews.title: 48 cards, only 3 sympathy
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped to have a good mix of occasion cards, but with only 3 sympathy cards, I now must purchase more. Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment for men and women. Comes in handy at last minute.
customer_reviews.author: Aja P.

customer_reviews.title: That assortment!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my card assortment. Have already used one of the birthday cards. We are in the middle of pandemic but now my seventeen grandchildren and eight great grands will be getting their birthday cards. I am unable to shop in local stores until times are normal.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Price
customer_reviews.text: These are good all occasion cards for the price. I wouldn’t use them for monumental celebrations, but they are nice to send out to let someone know that you are thinking of them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V

customer_reviews.title: Great cards to keep around
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap set, they are great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Burris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed Every card is blank I read the description and it is worded wrong I thought it meant some were blank some were birthday etc Every single one is blank had I know. That I wouldn’t have bought it
customer_reviews.author: Sheri galazo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. It would cost me $4.98 to return. So I will just throw away.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. I do not like the size of these cards and these do not come in a box that you can store them in. Too many congrats and thank you cards. Not enough birthday cards. Not a good choice for me for variety. I have bought better cards from school fundraisers.
customer_reviews.author: Windell E.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was a good box of basic greeting cards. There are duplicates in various colors (ex. for a boy or girl) and something for when you need a card in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice assortment of cards!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of cards to have in hand! Nice assortment, colorful, good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Luongo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful and a good assortment. I have already used two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great designs, easy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of cards with different messages and designs. Much more affordable than getting each one individually at the store! You'll have a great card for practically any situation.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hand on hand.
customer_reviews.text: I'm always in need of a last minute card and I hate paying $3 to $4 each so this is my solution! I just keep this box on hand when I'm in need and yank out the appropriate card. They're simple and easy to right a message in.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B. Good

customer_reviews.title: Simply put, they're great!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! So great to have around the house for last minute occasions. Good quality, they are printed on a thick card stock and for the price, they're just fabulous. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schutz

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend. She was happy, I was happy
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great Card Set
customer_reviews.text: Great set to have on hand for last minute cards
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great value, cute cards
customer_reviews.text: Loved the cards! Wish there were more "thank you" cards since I feel that I use those most, but overall they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is a great alternative. Lots of choices
customer_reviews.text: The dollar store went out of business in our area and I wasn’t going to spend five dollars for a greeting card. This is a great alternative. Lots of choices. I only wish they were less congratulations cards and more birthday cards.
customer_reviews.author: Barley

customer_reviews.title: Always available
customer_reviews.text: I add what I want the card to say. Also, always have a card available!
customer_reviews.author: LaDon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Basic cards for lots of different occasions and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyto2inATL

customer_reviews.title: was a gift
customer_reviews.text: My elderly Mom can not get to the store to purchase cards, this was a perfect gift for her
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are great to use for a quick send off. They cover a variety of events. Quality is good; nice and thick.
customer_reviews.author: Russell White

customer_reviews.title: Good variety for cards.
customer_reviews.text: Like the variety! Just wish some weren’t blank on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These aren't going to be the most beautiful cards you've ever received, but the designs are cute (and not cheesy!). The cards are thick and sturdy. Great to have on hand so you're prepared for any event.
customer_reviews.author: Jean L.

customer_reviews.title: Soso
customer_reviews.text: Very generic cards. All blank on the inside. Was hoping for something more unique
customer_reviews.author: baawhoba

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cards
customer_reviews.text: High quality cards. Not flimsy or cheap looking. Nice selection, exactly what I was hoping for, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tine bop

customer_reviews.title: Not enough envelopes
customer_reviews.text: There is a nice variety of cards in this pack but I was very disappointed I did not receive enough envelopes
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards at a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality cards at a great price - well worth purchasing to save tons of money over time. With most cards costing $4-5 each these days, this box of cards is a real bargain. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MaineMomma

customer_reviews.title: A nice back up
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I don't have access to jump out quickly for a sudden need for a card and I prefer the personal touch of my words only
customer_reviews.author: Richard Naran

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern colors and fonts.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that some cards were bent from packaging. Would prefer less generic blank cards and more sympathy or thinking of you. Otherwise very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Marreel

customer_reviews.title: Little bit of everything.
customer_reviews.text: Great little set of cards to keep around just in case you need to write a quick note of thanks, congratulations, condolences or birthday wishes. I love these cards and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua and Emily

product_meta.title: 48 All Occasion Greeting Cards - Assorted Happy Birthday, Thank You, Wedding, Blank Designs, Envelopes Included - 4 x 6 Inches
product_meta.description: This assorted pack of 48 all-occasion greeting cards will prepare you for all your card-sending needs! Cut the hassle of rushing to the store and overpaying for cards. This pack consists of 48 blank greeting cards to include your very own custom messages for corporate and personal use. Each card features a unique, fun, and colorful design. This pack consists of 2x Wedding Congratulations Cards, 4x Baby Shower Cards, 4x Sympathy Cards, 8x Congratulatory Cards, 6x Blank Cards, 8x Thank You Cards, and 16x Happy Birthday Cards. Make a statement with these thank you cards made of high-quality card stock that feels thick and sturdy. Each card measures at 4 x 6 inches and comes with corresponding envelopes. Ensure you have plenty of greeting cards on hand for when occasions arise.
feature_bullets: BULK BOX SET: 48 pack of all-occasion greeting cards featuring an assortment of 48 fun and colorful illustrations. Pack includes 2x Wedding Congratulations Cards, 4x Baby Shower Cards, 4x Sympathy Cards, 8x Congratulatory Cards, 6x Blank Cards, 8x Thank You Cards, and 16x Happy Birthday Cards.
BLANK ON THE INSIDE: Contains 48 blank cards to include your custom messages for business and personal use.
SUPERIOR QUALITY: Each card is printed on high-quality 250 gsm paper card stock for elegance and extra durability.
STOCK UP: Ensure you always have greeting cards on hand for when occasions arise throughout the year.
DIMENSIONS: Each card measures 4 x 6 inches. Includes 48 corresponding V-flap, wood free paper envelopes.
